column2: "Na Josef twae hwee n’egya n’enyim
"Na Josef hyɛɛ no nkowaa a wɔhyɛ fun edur no dɛ wɔnhyɛ n’egya akyenkyendur: na wɔhyɛɛ Israel akyenkyendur."
"Na wɔdze adaduanan dzii ho dwuma: nna mber a wɔdze wie akyenkyendur hyɛ nye no: na Egyptfo no suu no nda eduosuon."
"Na nda a wɔdze suu no no twaa mu no
column3: Josef kaa kyerɛɛ Farao ne fifo
column5: Sɛ afei menya hom enyim enyimnyam a
column12: muruwu: na nda a mabɔ ama moho wɔ Keenan asaase do no mu hɔ na kesie me. Dɛm ntsi

column2: "Na Farao see dɛ
column5: dɛ mbrɛ ɔmaa idzii nsew no ara."

column2: "Na Josef kɔree dɛ orikesie n’egya: na Farao no nkowaa nyinara
column4: nye Egypt asaase do mpanyimfo nyinara
column9: nyinara nye no kɔree. Hɔn mbofraba
column12: nko na wɔdaan hɔn gyaa Gosen asaase do."

column2: "Na ntseaseanam nye mpɔnkɔdofo nyina nye no kɔree: na ɔyɛɛ kuw kɛsenara."
"Na wɔbaa Atad ewuporoweebea a ɔwɔ Jordan egya no
column3: na hɔ na wotwaa kwadwom kɛse a no mu yɛ dzen papanara: na Josef suu n’egya nda esuon."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔtse asaase no do no
column4: hun osu a wosuu no wɔ Atad ewuporoweebea no
column6: Iyi yɛ eyi kɛse ma Egyptfo: dɛm ntsi wɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Abel-mizraim a ɔwɔ Jordan egya."

column2: "Na ne mba yɛɛ no dɛ mbrɛ ɔhyɛɛ hɔn no ara:"
"na ne mba soaa no kɔr Keenan asaase do
column3: na wokesiee no wɔ Makepela haban mu ɔbo tu no mu
column4: dza Abraham dze kaa haban no ho tɔɔ no wɔ Hetnyi Efron hɔ
column5: dze yɛɛ efunsiebea wɔ Mamre enyim no a."

column2: "Na Josef siee n’egya wiei ekyir no
column4: nye hɔn a wɔnye no kɔree kesiee n’egya no nyinara sanee kɔr Egypt."

column2: "Na Josef no nuanom no hun dɛ hɔn egya ewu no
column5: na bɔn a yɛdze yɛɛ no no nyinara oesusu mbrɛ ɔtse no ara atɔ hɛn do wer."

column2: "Na wɔsomae ma wɔkɛsee Josef dɛ
column3: Ansaana w’egya ruwu no ɔhyɛɛ dɛ
column9: dɛ wɔyɛɛ wo bɔn: na afei yɛserɛ wo
column10: fa w’egya ne Nyankopɔn no nkowaa hɔn bɔn kyɛ hɔn. Na Josef sui wɔ aber a wɔkaa dɛm kyerɛɛ no no."

column2: "Na no nuanom no so kɔree
column3: na wokotwitwae hwehwee n’enyim; na wɔsee dɛ

column2: "Na Josef see hɔn dɛ
column3: Mma hom nnsuro: ana migyina Nyankopɔn ananmu a?"

column2: "Hom dze
column3: hom dween dɛ wɔreyɛ me bɔn; na Nyankopɔn dze ɔdween dɛ oye
column4: ma ɔaayɛ dɛ mbrɛ ndɛ ɔayɛ yi

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei
column4: nye hom mbofraba. Na ɔkaa hɔn akoma too hɔn yamu
column5: na ɔkasaa ayamuyie mu kyerɛɛ hɔn."

column2: "Na Josef tsenaa Egypt
column3: ɔnoara nye n’egya ne fifo: na Josef dzii mfe ɔha nye du."

column2: "Na Josef hun Efraim ne mbanana a otsia ebiasa: Manaasɛ ne babanyin Makir ne mba so wɔwoo hɔn guu Josef n’aserɛ do."
"Na Josef see no nuanom no dɛ
column3: Morobɔkɔ me nsamankyir: na ampaara Nyankopɔn bɛba abɛsera hom
column4: na oebeyi hom efi asaase yi do akɔ asaase a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ Abraham
column5: Isaak nye Jakob no no do."

column2: "Na Josef maa Israelmba dzii nsew dɛ
column5: na hom nsoa me mbiew mfi ha nkɔ."

column2: "Na Josef wui
column3: nna oedzi mfe ɔha nye du: na wɔhyɛɛ no akyenkyendur
column4: na wɔtoo no adaka mu wɔ Egypt."
